wikipedia_page.main: James Michael Morton (born 29 October 1956) is a Scottish former footballer who played for several Scottish clubs in the 1970, 80s and 90s. Morton played in over 500 games and scored over 119 goals in all competitions during his career and is perhaps best known for his spell at St Johnstone F.C. where he remains the club's record top midfield goal scorer.
